alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:24PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms producing strong wind gusts will impact portions of southwestern Sweet Grass and Park Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 622 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms near Crescent Lake, or 16 miles northwest of Mammoth, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Sudden strong wind gusts may arrive well ahead of any rain or thunder. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Clyde Park, Chico Hot Springs, Pine Creek, Springdale, Chico, Corwin Springs, Emigrant and Jardine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Persons outdoors or in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley
